title: Tissue
description: Schema for submitting a tissue sample.

pmi.title: Post-mortem Interval
pmi.description: The amount of time elapsed since death.
pmi.comment: Post-mortem interval for tissues should be reported, if known.

pmi_units.title: Post-mortem Interval Units
pmi_units.description: The unit in which the PMI time was reported.
pmi_units.comment: Post-mortem interval units for tissues should be reported with PMI value, if known.

ccf_id.title: Common coordinate framework identifier
ccf_id.description: HubMap Common Coordinate Framework unique identifier corresponding to the organ, biological structure, and spatial location of the tissue specimen.
ccf_id.comment: This identifier will be later linked to: https://portal.hubmapconsortium.org/ccf-eui

preservation_method.title: Preservation Method
preservation_method.description: The method by which the tissue was preserved: cryopreservation (slow-freeze) or flash-freezing.
preservation_method.comment: Indicate the tissue preservation_method if known and may be/become an experimental variable to track.
